file_content.text: Stop it right there.
I'm going to need your ID, your papers and a blasted good reason why you're flying in and out of a war zone for kicks.
This is a private job for Jedi Master Sumalee. You want to tell her you tried to stop me?
I'm on important business.
Far as I know, our Jedi advisor was killed weeks ago.
I think I need to take a look-see, make sure you're not trying to smuggle valuable resources off Hoth....
I swear it's nothing like that. It's a, uh, rare herb, for my, uh, grandmother. She's very sick....
[Lie] You're wasting time.
Try a little silver coating on that lie, maybe I'll buy it.
I'm talking credits, if you didn't follow.
My apologies. Take this. My poor sick grandmother will thank you.
You have yourself a deal.
I'm sure she will.
I heard gunshots! I think the space station's under attack! Go check.
[Lie] Run for your life!
Are you kidding me? I'm a customs agent, not a soldier!
I'm getting into the inner hold. They say that's the safest place to be in an attack.
I can't believe he fell for that. I guess the war's gotten everyone a little jumpy.
Sorry, man. Your life's just not worth that much.
I'm broke. [Kill him]
I wouldn't do that. Master Sumalee said the cargo is Force sensitive. Non-Jedi can go blind and deranged just at the sight!
[Lie] It's too dangerous.
I knew it! I knew they wouldn't keep sending bodies down there if there wasn't something special under that ice!
Load your ship and get out of here. I'm telling the boys.
Blind and deranged? I can't believe he fell for that.
Don't question me!
Back off! [Kill him]
How about I add a bit to your salary, just for looking the other way?
Can you take credits, instead?
Now you're sounding reasonable.
It's a tough job, working customs. Almost makes you want to ask a special fine of those who don't show the respect.
You're clear to go, ma'am. Long live the Republic.
You're free and clear, sir. Long live the Republic.
Neatly done. I'll reimburse you the bribe, of course.
You're ruining my selfless gesture. Which I'm okay with.
I was trying to be generous.
Nothing better than a damsel in distress who picks up the tab.
[Flirt] Good.
Honey, I haven't been a damsel in a long time. But it's cute that you're trying.
I was hoping I wouldn't have to bill you.
Thanks.
What happens now?
I can take it from here. I've got my own ship stashed a few hangars down.
This one's a keeper, Risha.
Glad you're still kicking, Risha. You ever want to go legit, look me up.
Thanks for the help. You're welcome to any of the salvage in the shuttle. Some of it might fetch a good price.
And I'll make sure you get anything I learn about the Voidwolf.
You're not stopping me!
Out of my way! [Kill him]
Aggghhh!
You killed a customs agent? Just like that? You want to follow that up by kicking some puppies?
I can't believe you! He was on our side!
You're the one who said the Imperials have spies here. How do you know he wasn't one of them?
Not necessarily.
I guess he could have been. Usually I like a bit more proof before committing murder, though!
I, uh, guess I got a little overzealous.
Oops. Sorry.
There's a dead body lying here! We can't just....
I got you here, didn't I?
Don't question me!
I--I guess we'll just leave him here. Maybe it will start them looking for Imperial agents....
Be careful with this one, Risha. He seems a bit... unpredictable.
Are you sure you're not interested in joining the good guys, Risha?
We should clear out before someone finds us. I've got a ship nearby; I'll take it from here.
